attributes.action: Prohibit police officers from having sexual relationships while undercover
attributes.additional_details: We think this is state-funded abuse that must never happen again. At least 60 women are reported to have been deceived into relationships by undercover police officers.
attributes.background: Ban undercover police officers having sexual relationships as part of their undercover work. Ensure full and early disclosure is made to victims.
